# Ginger Snaps

## Ingredients

* 2.75 cups flour
* 2 tsp baking soda
* 1 tsp ground cloves
* 1 cup dark brown sugar
* 1 egg
* 2.5 tsp ground ginger
* 1 tsp ground cinnamon
* 0.75 cups chopped crystallized ginger
* 0.75 cups butter
* 0.25 cups molasses

## Instructions

Combine flour and spcies with crystallized ginger. Beat in sugar and butter until fluffy. Add eggs and molasses. Add flour mixture. Refrigerate 1 hour. Roll into 1 inch balls and roll balls in granulated sugar. Bake 12 minutes at 350&deg;F. Cool on the cookie sheets for about 5 minutes, then finish cooling on wire racks.
